about_the_game:
A fun little physics tower defense like game where creativity and embracing the chaos that ensues is key.





Defend your king by equipping his castle with elaborate traps!
Play increasingly difficult levels where the king is in his castle and needs to be defended.
Be creative in placing and activating a wide variety of trap to prevent the invaders from reaching your king.
The war chest is limited though, and all invaders must be dead when the countdown hits zero.
What creative solutions will you come up with? Will you sacrifice the enormous statue of your king and make it fall on top of our
invaders? Maybe you'll risk summoning a lightning storm which is very effective, but can also potentialy kill the king?
Or, if you like a more "hands on" approach, there's always the possibility to fling boulders at the enemy yourself ofcourse.
Experiment! Enjoy the chaos! Reign down everything you've got on your enemies!

3 Enemy Classes

Fight different enemy types each with their unique strengths and weaknesses to specific traps.

6 Unique Contraptions

Complete levels and unlock a wide range of different contraptions. Floortraps, springboards, rolling boulders and more

10 Challenging Levels

Unlock new levels by completing others.
Play old levels again to earn some extra coin or to try new tactics with the contraptions you've unlocked.
